name: KITCHEN KOMBAT!
description:
Good day Chefs! It's a rather busy day in your restaurant. Unfortunately, your ingredients have become sentient and have murderous intent! Fear not, with your mastery of the blade you can slice those goons into some fresh dishes to serve to your hungry, yet impatient customers! So don't go getting those orders wrong, and have a good time Chefs!

______________________________________________________________________

WASD to move;

E to Interact;

Q to cook placed ingredients;

Dish combinations:

Fries: 1x peeled potato;

Tomato soup: 1x sliced tomato;

Fries with ketchup: 1x peeled potato + 1x sliced tomato;
